#{params.no}, null,

insert into tb_admindiv (f_no, f_name, f_parentNo, f_level, f_kind) values
(#{item.no}, #{item.name}, #{item.parentNo}, #{item.level}, #{item.kind})
mapper.update:
update tb_admindiv
f_no = #{obj.no}, f_no = null,
f_name = #{obj.name}, f_name = null,
f_parentNo = #{obj.parentNo}, f_parentNo = null,
f_level = #{obj.level}, f_level = null,
f_kind = #{obj.kind}, f_kind = null,
and f_no = #{tag.no} and f_no is null
and f_no in(#{item})
and f_no >= #{tag.minNo} and f_no < #{tag.maxNo} and f_no like '%${tag.subNo}%' and f_no like '%${tag.startsWithNo}' and f_no like '${tag.endsWithNo}%'
and f_name = #{tag.name} and f_name is null
and f_name in(#{item})
and f_name >= #{tag.minName} and f_name < #{tag.maxName} and f_name like '%${tag.subName}%' and f_name like '%${tag.startsWithName}' and f_name like '${tag.endsWithName}%'
and f_parentNo = #{tag.parentNo} and f_parentNo is null
and f_parentNo in(#{item})
and f_parentNo >= #{tag.minParentNo} and f_parentNo < #{tag.maxParentNo} and f_parentNo like '%${tag.subParentNo}%' and f_parentNo like '%${tag.startsWithParentNo}' and f_parentNo like '${tag.endsWithParentNo}%'
and f_level = #{tag.level} and f_level is null
and f_level in(#{item})
and f_level >= #{tag.minLevel} and f_level < #{tag.maxLevel} and f_level like '%${tag.subLevel}%' and f_level like '%${tag.startsWithLevel}' and f_level like '${tag.endsWithLevel}%'
and f_kind = #{tag.kind} and f_kind is null
and f_kind in(#{item})
and f_kind >= #{tag.minKind} and f_kind < #{tag.maxKind} and f_kind like '%${tag.subKind}%' and f_kind like '%${tag.startsWithKind}' and f_kind like '${tag.endsWithKind}%'
